lead_paragraph: Germany's Rhoen-Klinikum is to sell most of its hospitals to rival Fresenius SE for 3.07 billion euros ($4.1 billion), in an attempt by Rhoen's founder to outflank opponents to an outright sale of the company.

headline.main: Rhoen-Klinikum to Sell Hospitals to Fresenius in $4 Billion Deal
headline.print_headline: Rhoen-Klinikum to Sell Hospitals to Fresenius in $4 Billion Deal
